summary: Allows you to upgrade Miraak\'s clothing, including his mask.
descriptionHtml:
Allows you to Upgrade Miraak\'s clothing, including his mask. There are 3 versions: One that changes his robes, gloves, and boots to Light Armor, one that changes the same to Heavy Armor, and a version that does the same as the Light Armor version, but his robes are just clothing.

No pictures, as the look of the gear is unchanged.
author: Hoodoo456

files.name: Upgradeable Miraak Clothing - Contains all 3 versions
files.fileName: Upgradeable Miraak Clothing - Contains all 3 versions-31183-1.zip
